casebody.data:
Eliza W. White, et al., Respondents v. Edward M. Benjamin, Appellant. Decided November 3, 1890. Appeal from an order directing defendant to furnish a bill of particulars. Whitlock & Simonds, for respondents. Smith & Dougherty, for appellant.

Before Freedman and Ingraham, JJ.

Order affirmed with $10 costs.
